metadata.name: M8VrS #1
metadata.description:
Genzo escapes to the shiny, happy metaverse. Or does he?

Layers of Genzo's hand-drawn artwork (with a transformative reveal on mint) combined with matching audio (vocals, ambient guitars and much more) result in thousands of possible unique versions of the song and art entitled, EsCp2ThM8VrS.

*BONUS: I will airdrop (to the original minter(s) only) the "reality" base layer illustration if one mints a version with one of the exact following 4 combinations:

1. Orange Drums, Night Bass, Future Guitars, Meta Keys, Spacesuit Vox + Squeak
2. Yellow Drums, Blue Bass, City Guitars, Road Keys, Suit Vox + Squeak
3. Green Drums, Sunset Bass, Forest Guitars, Grass Keys, Lumberjack Vox + Squeak
4. White Drums, Cloud Bass, Mountain Guitars, Snow Keys, Snowsuit Chorus Vox + Squeak

*LICENSE:
Holder has the right to use the version(s) of the copyrighted work worldwide for non-commercial purposes (without modification) including, but not limited to, syncing the music to visual images, with credit and social media links listed whenever possible. The visual artwork may be used for non-commercial purposes, display or publication with credit. Genzo retains full copyright to the underlying IP/song/artwork and all originally created assets.
